net.sf.juffrou.reflect

Class BeanWrapperContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.juffrou.reflect.BeanWrapperContext

  • public class BeanWrapperContext
extends Object
    Holds introspection information for a java bean class.

    Performs introspection and holds metadata information about a class used by the JuffrouBeanWrapper.
    If you have to create several BeanWrappers for the same java class, use BeanWrapperContext and save the introspection overhead.
    This class is thread safe.

    Author:
    cemartins

      • getBeanFieldHandler

        public net.sf.juffrou.reflect.internal.BeanFieldHandler getBeanFieldHandler(String propertyName)

      • getType

        public Type getType(String propertyName)
        Gets the type of a property in the wrapped bean. If that property references another bean (a nested bean) Its property types can also be obtained by specifying a property path.
        For example getType("pro1.prop2") will get the type of prop2 from the nested bean referenced by prop1.
        For each nested bean referenced in this manner, a nested bean wrapper is automatically created. In the previous example, a bean wrapper would be created for the bean referenced by property prop1.
        Parameters:
        propertyName -
        Returns:
